dict.acceptation: 材料，原料，资料；〈俚〉钱，现金；填充物；素材资料；

sent.orig: Why don't you just weigh out the good stuff about the relationship against the bad stuff.
sent.trans: 那你为什么不衡量一下好的方面和坏的方面。

sent.orig: A carbon price sends business a price signal to invest in clean stuff not dirty stuff.
sent.trans: 碳价格给企业发送了一个价格信号，一定要投资到清洁产品、而不是高污染产品。

sent.orig: Readymade Garments, Food Stuff, Oil and Gas Field Equipment, Oilfield Equipment, Readymade Garments, Food Stuff.
sent.trans: 采购产品成衣，食品，油和瓦斯田设备，成衣，食品。

sent.orig: A while after, when the priest had done his stuff, they came to the stuff again.
sent.trans: 过了一会儿，在牧师做完祷告后，他们便继续去做各自的事了。

sent.orig: The three immutable facts; you own stuff, you will die. Some one will get that stuff.
sent.trans: 三个亘古不变的事实；你的所有。你会死去。有人会得到你的所有。
